Articles.Content:
Build a spaceplane, fly to Eeloo, land on one of the brown spots on Eeloo, deploy a probe or a base and return to Kerbin. You've got 1 launch, so there'll be no refuel. Good luck

If you do the challenge and you have a youtube channel, put the link to your YouTube channel in the comments below, make a video of it, upload it on youtube and comment with the link with your video again. If you haven't got a youtube channel, just upload photos and say that it's to this challenge, as I'd love to see some results You've got 4 days maximum for this challenge. Good luck
Mods, debug menu, cheats, config file edits? Be more specific please.

No mods, nothing else, only stock. No cheats of course, that would be boring, wouldn't it? You can refuel twice maximum... You need to launch from the runway like an airplane, land on eeloo, deploy a probe or a base, return to Kerbin and land (on the runway if possible)

No mods, nothing else, only stock. No cheats of course, that would be boring, wouldn't it? You can refuel twice maximum... You need to launch from the runway like an airplane, land on eeloo, deploy a probe or a base, return to Kerbin and land (on the runway if possible)
Alrighty. Thanks.
The one challenge that I know I will fail.
Ya I am pretty sure you would need some sort of warp drive to make it to Eeloo in 2 days, Not even a mamoth with infinite fuel could do that

You can refuel twice maximum...
Thought you said no refuelling?

Make the rules more specific. Also, you need to do the challenge first.

So test your challenge yourself first to make sure it is possible, you don't have to be successful but you'll soon know if the challenge has a hope of being completed.
